PySpeak

Simple Package To Speak In Python

How to use:

```python
from Pyspeak import talk


# only 2 voices are available male and female
Voice = 1
# How fast to speak
Rate = 175

talk.settings(Voice, Rate)
talk.talk("This is me speaking using pyspeak")
```
